original_text: And when they found them not, they drew Jason and certain brethren unto the rulers of the city, crying, These that have turned the world upside down are come hither also;
korean_text: 발견하지 못하매 야손과 몇 형제들을 끌고 읍장들 앞에 가서 소리 질러 이르되 천하를 어지럽게 하던 이 사람들이 여기도 이르매

sentences.original_text: And when they found them not,
they drew Jason and certain brethren
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 야손과 몇몇 형제들을 끌고 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: These that have turned the world upside down
